original_text: Then Pashhur beat Jeremiah the prophet, and put him in the stocks that were in the upper Benjamin Gate of the house of the Lord.
korean_text: 이에 바스훌이 선지자 예레미야를 때리고 여호와의 성전에 있는 베냐민 문 위층에 목에 씌우는 나무 고랑으로 채워 두었더니

sentences.original_text: Then Pashhur beat Jeremiah the prophet
and put him in the stocks
that were in the upper Benjamin Gate
of the house of the Lord
